caption:
The photograph captures a scene within a cemetery where a mechanical excavation is taking place. In the center of the image is a large, yellow backhoe that is actively engaged in digging a hole in the ground. A substantial mound of fresh earth is lifted in the bucket of the backhoe, indicating that digging has recently occurred.

The surroundings suggest a peaceful, well-kept cemetery with lush green grass. There are several headstones visible variously in the background, modest in size and scattered throughout the area. The backdrop features a landscape of rolling hills and a few trees under a clear blue sky, hinting at a serene, rural setting.

The focus of the activity is the excavation by the backhoe, possibly for the purpose of making a grave considering the location. The overall atmosphere, although featuring heavy machinery, retains a sense of calm typical of a cemetery environment.
title: Cemetery at Rifle
